This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS scroll-boundary-behavior-y: none should only prevent scroll propagation on y axis with: wheel. 
PASS scroll-boundary-behavior-x: none should only prevent scroll propagation on x axis with: wheel. 
PASS scroll-boundary-behavior should not affect scrolling inside the applied container with: wheel. 
FAIL scroll-boundary-behavior-y: none should only prevent scroll propagation on y axis with: touch. assert_equals: expected 0 but got 100
FAIL scroll-boundary-behavior-x: none should only prevent scroll propagation on x axis with: touch. assert_equals: expected 0 but got 100
FAIL scroll-boundary-behavior should not affect scrolling inside the applied container with: touch. assert_equals: expected 0 but got 100
Harness: the test ran to completion.
